    • Method Detail

      • getPeers

        public Stream<Peer> getPeers​(Torrent torrent)
        Description copied from interface: DHTService
        Creates a peer lookup for a given torrent. Blocks the caller thread if the DHT services are unavailable at the moment of calling.
        Specified by:
        getPeers in interface DHTService
        Returns:
        Stream of peers. Retrieval of the next element might block. The stream ends when the current lookup is exhausted.

      • getPeers

        public Stream<Peer> getPeers​(TorrentId torrentId)
        Description copied from interface: DHTService
        Creates a peer lookup for a given torrent. Blocks the caller thread if the DHT services are unavailable at the moment of calling.
        Specified by:
        getPeers in interface DHTService
        Returns:
        Stream of peers. Retrieval of the next element might block. The stream ends when the current lookup is exhausted.
